title: DOGE Functionality
text: now, scraper captures data doge.gov/savings. relies `rvest reads dynamically-generated scripts. data cleaned, returned table format. writing vignette, DOGE displayed data three groups: contracts, grants, real-estate. group continas different table structure, data returned named list, comprised three dataframes. key columns reference ceiling_value value. correspond “Total Value” “Savings” tabs doge.gov/savings. desired, can save data .RDS file flagging saveFile=TRUE, providing directory location saveDir parameter.
code: df <- doge_get_data(verbose=T,saveFile = F) #> Fetching url... #> Capturing elements... #> Cleaning raw data... #> Checking brackets... #> Converting to JSON... #> Building objects... #> Dataframe cleaning... #> Building return list... #> Writing file... #> Done. names(df) #> [1] "contracts" "leases"    "grants"

title: DOGE Functionality
text: contracts table fpds_link column, allowing user click relevant entry fpds.gov. appear inconsistencies. Therefore, assist validating published data government data, can use fpds_get_data() query ATOM feed contract. Two types contracts identified DOGE data: awards IDV. Information , variables available FPDS data dictionary: https://www.fpds.gov/downloads/Version_1.5_specs/FPDS_DataDictionary_V1.5.pdf. structured slightly differently, fpds_get_data() return named list, relevant dataframes. note, avoid overloading memory, FPDS data written tempdir() location, merged end function.

title: DOGE Functionality
text: data doge.gov/savings periodically updated. , can use fpds_get_new() new DOGE data, existing FPDS data object identify query new additions DOGE data. alleviates unnecessarily long queries every time ’s change doge.gov/savings.

title: DOGE Functionality
text: Two basic convenience functions available. First, doge_summarise() presents basic statistical information dataset downloaded doge.gov/savings. Second, fpds_stats lists basic information number rows downloaded FPDS.
code: doge_summarize(df) #> Number of Contracts Entries: 5356  #> Number of Leases Entries: 793  #> Number of Grants Entries: 7488  #>  #> Max Contract: $1,900,000,000  #> Max Lease: $26,357,330  #> Max Grant: $4,000,000,000  #>  #> Max Contract Savings: $1,900,000,000  #> Max Lease Savings: $31,830,982  #> Max Grant Savings: $1,750,000,000  #>  #> Min Contract Savings: $0  #> Min Lease Savings: $0  #> Min Grant Savings: $0  #>  #> Median Contract Savings: $55,803  #> Median Leases Savings: $171,209  #> Median Grant Savings: $28,012  #>  #> ------ #> Estimated savings are currently $105,000,000,000. The doge.gov/savings website states that approximately 30% of receipts. Posted receipts total $35,074,449,878. Extrapolating, this would suggest we should see $116,914,832,927 in savings. This is a difference of -$11,914,832,927. #>  #>    Category     Total_Value         Savings #> 1 Contracts $39,093,933,457 $17,965,010,314 #>  #>  #>   Category Annual_Lease      Savings #> 1 title: Get FPDS Data — fpds_get_data
text: iterative function query FPDS data PIID using FPDS Atom Feed. See https://www.fpds.gov/fpdsng_cms/index.php/en/worksite information.

code: fpds_get_data(piid = NULL, return = NULL, verbose = TRUE)

title: Get FPDS Data — fpds_get_data
text: piid PIID value vector values. return "raw", output raw HTML file. verbose Logical, display progressbar.

title: Get FPDS Data — fpds_get_data
text: named list, consisting two dataframes: AWARDS IDV.

title: FPDS Get New — fpds_get_new

text: doge_data data object created doge_get_data() fpds_data data object created fpds_get_data() verbose Logical, whether return messages. return Whether return merged file new old data, simply new data.

title: FPDS Stats — fpds_stats
text: simple function return quick dirty stats FPDS data downloaded. Particularly useful determining nrow() achieved intended, compare data captured doge scraper.

title: FPDS Stats — fpds_stats
text: df data object returned fpds_get_data(). returnSummary Logical, whether return stat summary. returnUniquePIIDs Logical, whether return unique PIID values.

title: FPDS Stats — fpds_stats
text: printed data.frame, optional vector PIID values.

title: FPDS Table — fpds_table
text: function read FDPS XML data, clean , create table data. Since "award" "IDV" queries return slightly different XML tags, discriminate two returns tabulature.

text: prompt text prompt sent via chat_openai(). api_key Api key supplied set environmental variable. model Select proper mode. Recommended (default): gpt-4o-mini cost effectiveness.

text: Text object

title: oa_summary() — oa_summary
text: packaged summary request oa_query. Can modified two user args.

title: oa_summary() — oa_summary
code: oa_summary(   text = NULL,   summary_prompt = NULL,   summary_sentence_length = 5,   api_key = NULL,   model = "gpt-4o-mini" )

title: oa_summary() — oa_summary
text: text Text summarized. NOTE: Depending model, limited token size. gpt-4o-mini, example limited 200,000 TPM. summary_prompt user-supplied summary prompt. Default "Generate brief summary following text." summary_sentence_length user-supplied limit summary length. Default 5 sentences. api_key Api key supplied set environmental variable. model Select proper mode. Recommended (default): gpt-4o-mini cost effectiveness.

title: oa_summary() — oa_summary
text: text response.

title: oa_summary() — oa_summary
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ oa_summary(text="This is a bunch of text.") } # }
